articles.author: Peter
articles.title: Nintendo Switch OLED launches today, but buyers in the US and Europe report delays - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
articles.description: The revamped console launches today, but most stores don't have it in stock.
articles.content:
The Nintendo Switch OLED is going on sale today or was supposed to, anyway. The pre-orders are over and retailers should be shipping consoles to early buyers, but they are reporting delays.
Indeed, … [+972 chars]

articles.content: The head of the European Commission has vowed a swift response to a ruling from Polands top court rejecting the supremacy of EU law, which has thrown relations between Brussels and Warsaw into a cris… [+4551 chars]
